AboutComponents.heading: About us
AboutComponents.title: We bring health to people!
AboutComponents.description: NDINOFF Group is a company that produces natural, effective, and scientifically backed cosmetic products. We serve our customers with healthy skin, reliable results, and high-quality products.
AboutComponents.main_description: NDINOFF Group is an innovative brand operating in the field of beauty and health since 2019. Our products are of high quality, meet international standards, and are recommended by specialists.

news.null: No discounted products available at the moment!

doctor_page.title: The trust of medical professionals is our greatest value.
doctor_page.desc_1: Ndinoff products have drawn the attention of healthcare specialists for their natural composition, high-quality formulas, and proven practical results.
doctor_page.desc_2: Doctors from various fields have observed positive improvements in patients who used our products and have noted their high level of quality.
doctor_page.desc_3: The specialists presented below are dedicated, experienced, and highly qualified professionals who have recognized the quality of Ndinoff products.
doctor_page.desc_4: For us, this trust represents both confidence and responsibility — a commitment to maintain excellence, safety, and care for every individual’s well-being.

home.title: Ndinoff — Modern health & beauty innovations
home.description: Ndinoff is a modern manufacturing company in Uzbekistan promoting health, beauty, and a balanced lifestyle through science-based, natural products.
home.keywords: Ndinoff, health, beauty, supplements, Uzbekistan, cosmetics

about.title: About Us — Ndinoff Company
about.description: Since 2020, Ndinoff has been producing high-quality dietary supplements, cosmetics, and food products that meet international standards.
about.keywords: Ndinoff company, about Ndinoff, dietary supplements, cosmetics, production

products.title: Ndinoff Products — Natural. Safe. Effective.
products.description: Discover Ndinoff’s range of dietary supplements, cosmetics, and health products crafted to support a healthy and beautiful life.
products.keywords: Ndinoff products, supplements, cosmetics, natural products, health

doctors.title: Our Doctors — Experts in Health and Wellness
doctors.description: Meet our professional doctors dedicated to providing trusted, science-backed health and lifestyle advice.
doctors.keywords: Ndinoff doctors, health experts, wellness, medical advice

news.title: News — Latest Updates from Ndinoff
news.description: Stay informed about Ndinoff’s latest product launches, innovations, and health-related news.
news.keywords: Ndinoff news, health updates, company news, innovations
